metadata.title: CVE-2021-24032 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
Beginning in v1.4.1 and prior to v1.4.9, due to an incomplete fix forCVE-2021-24031, the Zstandard command-line utility created output fileswith default permissions and restricted those permissions immediatelyafterwards. Output files could therefore momentarily be readable orwritable to unintended parties.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-24032` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libzstd1 - 1.4.8+dfsg-2build1
zstd - 1.4.8+dfsg-2build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libzstd package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4.8+dfsg-2build1').
